overview: Intention tells the story of two young men who come from completely different backgrounds and have very little in common at the beginning. The first one Janik is a womanizer and swindler; he used to have it all, but lost his fortune due to his adventurous spirit. The other one Arif is a poor and God-fearing man, who earns his living by making wooden toys for children. An accident brings them together in the market.
title: Intention
